message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and efficiency of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and benefits, I estimate its true worth to be $12,000. However, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $11,000. This exclusive opportunity is designed to ensure you receive the best value while also securing a beneficial deal for us. Please let me know if this offer aligns with your needs and budget.
